alert.note: Alert for Chattooga; Floyd; Gordon; Murray; Walker; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 7:29PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Murray, northeastern Floyd, south central Whitfield, southeastern Walker, western Gordon and northern Chattooga Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 729 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Tidings, or 8 miles east of Summerville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Calhoun, Summerville, Trion, Resaca, Plainville, Shannon, Pinson, Oostanaula, Subligna, Suttles Mill, Tidings, Armuchee, Lake Marvin, Berryton, Sugar Valley, Everett Springs, Nickelsville and James H. Floyd State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
